text: Lawrence Donald Soens (August 26, 1926 â€“ November 1, 2021) was an American Roman Catholic prelate. He was a bishop of the Catholic Church. He was Bishop of Sioux City, Iowa from 1983 to 1998. Soens was born in Iowa City, Iowa. He became a priest in 1950. Soens died on November 1, 2021 in Sioux City at the age of 95.Lawrence Donald Soens ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Iowa City, Iowa Category:People from Sioux City, Iowa
title: Lawrence Donald Soens
